name: Dartmaster 8in1 - Best Free Darts and Sport Game Mania
name_original: Dartmaster 8in1 - Best Free Darts and Sport Game Mania
description:
Dartmaster 8in1 is the best high-score darts game on the market! The game contains 8 games, 3 difficulties and gameplay for 1 or 2 players! The game is high-score based with 24 different leaderboards, so do not forget to submit your score to see who is the best darts player, you are playing against people all around the world! Enjoy Dartmaster 8in1!

Games included:

-301, 501, 701, 901 - You are starting with 301/501/701/901 points! Try to reach exactly zero points in the lowest number of the rounds!
- Max 10 - You have 10 darts, try to get the best score possible!
- Random 20 - There will be generated random number that you must hit. You have 20 rounds, hit as many numbers as you can!
- Dartmaster - You have 45 seconds to get the best score possible!
- 1to20 - Try to hit 1-20 numbers in linear order with the lowest number of the darts!

Features:

* 8 dart games in 1
* 3 difficulties
* for 1 or 2 players
* 24 global leaderboards
* great fun for al lages
* 100% free full version with no In-App purchases

Enjoy and have a nice time playing our darts game Dartmaster 8in1 and if you enjoy the game please rate it and leave some comment to support it.

If you find any bug, please let us know at littlebigplay@gmail.com, we will be very happy to fix it!

Support links:

Email: littlebigplay@gmail.com
